sn55.51:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.51:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.51:2.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.51:2.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.51:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
sn55.51:2.9: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
